Body: I want to view style sheets/html pages via the Android emulator. I pulled the html pages into the SD Card and was able to view them. However, I'm not sure how to pull the style sheets/javascript in to see specific styling.How can that be done? I'm not a programmer, but can find my way around Eclipse pretty well if that is needed.
Title: Viewing local style sheets/javascript/html using Emulator

history.Text: I'm new to Eclipse and testing style sheets/html pages via the Android emulator. I pulled the html pages into the SD Card and was able to view them. However, I'm not sure how to pull the style sheets/javascript in to see specific styling. I'm not a programmer, but can find my way around Eclipse pretty well. Any help is appreciated.
Testing local style sheets/javascript/html using Emulator
